Package cetus.application

Class IPChainAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • cetus.analysis.AnalysisPass
      • cetus.application.IPChainAnalysis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DefUseChain, UseDefChain
    public class IPChainAnalysis
extends AnalysisPass
implements DefUseChain, UseDefChain
    This class performs the interprocedural Def-Use and Use-Def chain computation. It uses the program summary graph which is implemented in ProgramSummaryGraph.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class cetus.analysis.AnalysisPass

        parallel_looplist, program
